divs: Sighting DetailsiT was between 1am and 1:15 am on the morning of April 7th, 2008. I was in my car driving around the neighborhood looking for my cat. I saw a red light about the size of two quarters behind the trees and it was movng. It pulsed. I was curious and followed it to get a closer look. It crossed over rt 309 over behind Walmart and then I couldn't follow it anymore as the road ended and it eventually was out of site. It had a really bright big red light and some smaller white lights and some other colors - couldn't tell exactly what the other colors were as it moved quickly and the I lost site of it. It was pretty low as it appeared to be behind trees. The red light pulsed and the other lights twinkled and changed color rapidly.
Summary: Big red light with small white and some other color seen moving across sky
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around April 7th 2008
